titleStmt.title: The case between Doctor John Badger and the College of Physicians in London who in July, August and September in the year 1683 presented himself to the president and censors to be examined ...
titleStmt.author: Badger, John, fl. 1693.

notesStmt.note: Badger's claim that he was unfairly excluded from the Society.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
